title: Advice to feed babies peanuts early and often helped thousands of kids avoid allergies
summary: A decade after landmark research showed feeding peanut products to young babies prevents life-threatening allergies, new data confirms this approach has significantly reduced peanut allergy rates. Peanut allergies in children ages 0-3 fell by over 27% after 2015 guidelines and over 40% after 2017 updates, preventing about 40,000 peanut allergies.
